reports.title: Physical Data Model - Excluding Catalogue for clarity
reports.query:
CALL apoc.meta.subGraph({labels: ["DataModelRoot", "DataModelIGRoot", "DataModelIGValue", "DataModelPackage", "DataModelRoot", "DataModelValue", "DatasetClass", "Dataset", "Dataset", "DatasetClassInstance", "DatasetInstance", "VariableClass", "DatasetVariable", "VariableClassInstance", "DatasetVariableInstance"]})
YIELD nodes, relationships
RETURN *

reports.title: Catalogues, models and versions
reports.query:
MATCH path=(:DataModelCatalogue)-[:HAS_DATA_MODEL|HAS_DATA_MODEL_IG|HAS_VERSION*2]->()
WITH nodes(path) as no
WITH no, last(no) as leaf
WITH  [n IN no[..-1] | coalesce(n.uid, n.name)] AS result, count(leaf) as val
RETURN result, val

reports.title: Available models
reports.query:
MATCH (:DataModelCatalogue)-->(m:DataModelRoot)
RETURN "Select" AS select, m.uid AS model

reports.title: Versions - $neodash_model_uid
reports.query:
MATCH (n:DataModelRoot)-->(m:DataModelValue)
WHERE n.uid=$neodash_model_uid
RETURN DISTINCT "Select" AS select, m.name AS version ORDER BY version DESC

reports.title: Classes - $neodash_model_version
reports.query:
MATCH (:DataModelValue {name: $neodash_model_version})
-[rel:HAS_DATASET_CLASS]->(:DatasetClassInstance)<--(class:DatasetClass)
WITH class.uid AS class, apoc.text.split(rel.ordinal, "\.") AS split_ordinal ORDER BY toInteger(split_ordinal[0]), toInteger(split_ordinal[1])
RETURN DISTINCT "Select" AS select, class

reports.title: Variable Classes - $neodash_class_uid
reports.query:
MATCH (model_value:DataModelValue {name: $neodash_model_version})
-[:HAS_DATASET_CLASS]->(class_value:DatasetClassInstance)<--(:DatasetClass {uid: $neodash_class_uid})
MATCH (class_value)-[rel:HAS_VARIABLE_CLASS]->(variable_value:VariableClassInstance)<--(variable_root:VariableClass)
WHERE rel.version_number=model_value.version_number
OPTIONAL MATCH (variable_value)-[qualified_rel:QUALIFIES_VARIABLE]->(qualified_value:VariableClassInstance)<--(qualified_root:VariableClass)
WHERE qualified_rel.version_number=model_value.version_number
WITH variable_root, variable_value, collect(DISTINCT qualified_root.uid) AS qualifies, rel.ordinal AS ordinal ORDER BY toInteger(ordinal)
RETURN DISTINCT variable_root.uid AS variable, variable_value.label AS label, variable_value.role AS role, qualifies, $neodash_class_uid AS origin, 'mastermodel' AS mastermodel

UNION

MATCH (model_root:DataModelRoot)-->(model_value:DataModelValue {name: $neodash_model_version})
-[:HAS_DATASET_CLASS]->(class_value:DatasetClassInstance)<--(:DatasetClass {uid: $neodash_class_uid})
MATCH p=(class_value)-[parent_rel:HAS_PARENT_CLASS*..2]->(parent_class_value:DatasetClassInstance)
WHERE all(parent_rel in relationships(p) where parent_rel.catalogue=model_root.uid AND parent_rel.version_number=model_value.version_number)
MATCH ()-[parent_has_class_rel:HAS_DATASET_CLASS]->(parent_class_value)<--(parent_class_root:DatasetClass)
MATCH (parent_class_value)-[rel:HAS_VARIABLE_CLASS]->(variable_value:VariableClassInstance)<--(variable_root:VariableClass)
WHERE rel.version_number=model_value.version_number
OPTIONAL MATCH (variable_value)-[qualified_rel:QUALIFIES_VARIABLE]->(qualified_value:VariableClassInstance)<--(qualified_root:VariableClass)
WHERE qualified_rel.version_number=model_value.version_number
WITH parent_class_root.uid AS parent_class, parent_has_class_rel.ordinal AS parent_ordinal, variable_root, variable_value, collect(DISTINCT qualified_root.uid) AS qualifies, rel.ordinal AS ordinal ORDER BY parent_ordinal, toInteger(ordinal)
RETURN DISTINCT variable_root.uid AS variable, variable_value.label AS label, variable_value.role AS role, qualifies, parent_class AS origin, 'mastermodel' AS mastermodel

reports.title: Implemented by
reports.query:
MATCH (:DataModelValue {name: $neodash_model_version})<-[:IMPLEMENTS]-(ig:DataModelIGValue)
WITH collect(ig.name) AS names
RETURN apoc.text.join(names, ', ')

reports.title: Selected master model - Next tab
reports.query: RETURN $neodash_sponsor_model_version_name

reports.title: Master Model version of Dataset Class : $neodash_master_model_variable_class
reports.query:
MATCH (model_root:DataModelRoot)-->(model_value:DataModelValue {name: $neodash_model_version})
-[:HAS_DATASET_CLASS]->(dataset_value:DatasetClassInstance)<--(dataset:DatasetClass {uid: $neodash_class_uid})
MATCH (dataset_value)-[:HAS_VARIABLE_CLASS]->(:VariableClassInstance)<--(variable_root:VariableClass)
WHERE variable_root.uid=$neodash_master_model_variable_class
WITH variable_root, dataset

MATCH (sm_model_value:SponsorModelValue)-[:HAS_DATASET_CLASS]->(sm_dataset:SponsorModelDatasetClassInstance)<-[:HAS_INSTANCE]-(dataset)
MATCH (sm_dataset)-[rel:HAS_VARIABLE_CLASS]->(sm_variable_value:SponsorModelVariableClassInstance)<-[:HAS_INSTANCE]-(variable_root)
WHERE sm_model_value.name=$neodash_sponsor_model_version_name AND toString(rel.version_number)=$neodash_sponsor_model_version_number

RETURN DISTINCT
  sm_variable_value.is_basic_std AS basic_std,
  sm_variable_value.label AS label,
  sm_variable_value.variable_type AS type,
  sm_variable_value.length AS length,
  sm_variable_value.display_format AS displayformat,
  sm_variable_value.xml_datatype AS xmldatatype,
  sm_variable_value.xml_codelist AS xmlcodelist,
  sm_variable_value.core AS core,
  sm_variable_value.origin AS origin,
  sm_variable_value.role AS role,
  sm_variable_value.term AS term,
  sm_variable_value.qualifiers AS qualifiers,
  sm_variable_value.ig_comment AS ig_comment,
  rel.ordinal AS order

reports.title: Available guides
reports.query:
MATCH (:DataModelCatalogue)-->(m:DataModelIGRoot)
WHERE m.uid contains "SDTMIG" OR m.uid contains "SENDIG"
RETURN "Select" AS select, m.uid AS guide

reports.title: Versions - $neodash_ig_uid
reports.query:
MATCH (n:DataModelIGRoot)-->(m:DataModelIGValue)
WHERE n.uid=$neodash_ig_uid
OPTIONAL MATCH (m)-[:IMPLEMENTS]->(model)
RETURN DISTINCT "Select" AS select, m.name AS version, model.name AS implements ORDER BY version DESC

reports.title: Datasets - $neodash_ig_version
reports.query:
MATCH (catalogue:DataModelCatalogue)-->(model_root:DataModelIGRoot)-->(model_value:DataModelIGValue {name: $neodash_ig_version})
-[rel:HAS_DATASET]->(value:DatasetInstance)<--(dataset:Dataset)
OPTIONAL MATCH (value)-[implements:IMPLEMENTS_DATASET_CLASS]->(class_value)<-[:HAS_INSTANCE]-(class_root)
WHERE implements.catalogue = catalogue.name AND implements.version_number = model_value.version_number
WITH dataset.uid AS dataset, class_root.uid AS implements, apoc.text.split(rel.ordinal, "\.") AS split_ordinal ORDER BY toInteger(split_ordinal[0]), toInteger(split_ordinal[1])
RETURN DISTINCT "Select" AS select, dataset, implements

reports.title: Variables - $neodash_dataset_uid
reports.query:
MATCH (model_root:DataModelIGRoot)-->(model_value:DataModelIGValue {name: $neodash_ig_version})
-[:HAS_DATASET]->(dataset_value:DatasetInstance)<--(:Dataset {uid: $neodash_dataset_uid})
MATCH (dataset_value)-[rel:HAS_DATASET_VARIABLE]->(variable_value:DatasetVariableInstance)<--(variable_root:DatasetVariable)
WHERE rel.version_number=model_value.version_number
OPTIONAL MATCH (variable_value)-[:REFERENCES_CODELIST]->(codelist:CTCodelistRoot)
OPTIONAL MATCH (codelist)-[:HAS_ATTRIBUTES_ROOT]->(codelistattributeroot:CTCodelistAttributesRoot)-[:LATEST]->(codelistattributevalue:CTCodelistAttributesValue)
OPTIONAL MATCH (variable_value)-[implements:IMPLEMENTS_VARIABLE]->()<-[:HAS_INSTANCE]-(implemented)
WHERE implements.catalogue = model_root.uid AND implements.version_number = model_value.version_number
WITH variable_root, variable_value, codelist, codelistattributevalue, implemented, apoc.text.split(rel.ordinal, "\.") AS split_ordinal ORDER BY toInteger(split_ordinal[0]), toInteger(split_ordinal[1])
RETURN DISTINCT variable_root.uid AS variable, variable_value.label AS label, variable_value.description AS description,
  variable_value.simple_datatype AS dataType, variable_value.role AS role,
  collect(DISTINCT (codelist.uid + ' ' + codelistattributevalue.submission_value)) AS codelist,
  implemented.uid AS implements,
  "Master Model" AS mastermodel

reports.title: Master Model
reports.query:
MATCH (model_value:DataModelIGValue {name: "SDTMIG v3.2"})<-[:EXTENDS_VERSION]-(smv:SponsorModelValue)
MATCH (smv)<-[v:HAS_VERSION]-(:DataModelIGRoot)
RETURN "select" AS select, smv.name AS name, v.version AS version

reports.title: Master Model version of variable : $neodash_master_model_variable
reports.query:
MATCH (model_root:DataModelIGRoot)-->(model_value:DataModelIGValue {name: $neodash_ig_version})
-[:HAS_DATASET]->(dataset_value:DatasetInstance)<--(dataset:Dataset {uid: $neodash_dataset_uid})
MATCH (dataset_value)-[:HAS_DATASET_VARIABLE]->(:DatasetVariableInstance)<--(variable_root:DatasetVariable)
WHERE variable_root.uid=$neodash_master_model_variable
WITH variable_root, dataset

MATCH (sm_model_value:SponsorModelValue)-[:HAS_DATASET]->(sm_dataset:SponsorModelDatasetInstance)<-[:HAS_INSTANCE]-(dataset)
MATCH (sm_dataset)-[rel:HAS_DATASET_VARIABLE]->(sm_variable_value:SponsorModelDatasetVariableInstance)<-[:HAS_INSTANCE]-(variable_root)
WHERE sm_model_value.name=$neodash_sponsor_model_version_name AND toString(rel.version_number)=$neodash_sponsor_model_version_number

RETURN DISTINCT
  sm_variable_value.is_basic_std AS basic_std,
  sm_variable_value.label AS label,
  sm_variable_value.variable_type AS type,
  sm_variable_value.length AS length,
  sm_variable_value.display_format AS displayformat,
  sm_variable_value.xml_datatype AS xmldatatype,
  sm_variable_value.xml_codelist AS xmlcodelist,
  sm_variable_value.core AS core,
  sm_variable_value.origin AS origin,
  sm_variable_value.role AS role,
  sm_variable_value.term AS term,
  sm_variable_value.qualifiers AS qualifiers,
  sm_variable_value.ig_comment AS ig_comment,
  sm_variable_value.enrich_rule AS enrich_rule,
  rel.ordinal AS order

reports.title: Available versions
reports.query:
MATCH (model_value:DataModelIGValue)<-[:EXTENDS_VERSION]-(smv:SponsorModelValue)
<-[v:HAS_VERSION]-(model_root:DataModelIGRoot)
WHERE model_root.uid="SDTMIG"
RETURN "select" AS select, v.version AS version, model_value.name AS extends, smv.name AS name
ORDER BY version DESC

reports.title: Datasets - $neodash_mm_version_number - $neodash_mm_version_name
reports.query:
MATCH (smv:SponsorModelValue)-[rel_smv:HAS_DATASET]->(smdi:SponsorModelDatasetInstance)<-[:HAS_INSTANCE]-(dataset:Dataset)
WHERE smv.name=$neodash_mm_version_name
RETURN "select" AS select,
dataset.uid AS uid,
smdi.label AS label,
smdi.is_basic_std AS basic_std,
smdi.purpose AS purpose,
smdi.ig_comment AS ig_comment,
smdi.xml_path AS xml_path
ORDER BY toInteger(rel_smv.ordinal)

reports.title: Variables - $neodash_mm_dataset
reports.query:
MATCH (smv:SponsorModelValue)-[rel_smv:HAS_DATASET]->(smdi:SponsorModelDatasetInstance)<-[:HAS_INSTANCE]-(dataset:Dataset)
WHERE smv.name=$neodash_mm_version_name AND dataset.uid=$neodash_mm_dataset
MATCH (smdi)-[rel_smdi:HAS_DATASET_VARIABLE]->(sm_variable_value:SponsorModelDatasetVariableInstance)<-[:HAS_INSTANCE]-(variable_root:DatasetVariable)
WHERE rel_smdi.version_number=$neodash_mm_version_number
OPTIONAL MATCH (variable_root)<-[key:HAS_KEY]-(smdi)

RETURN DISTINCT
  variable_root.uid AS uid,
  sm_variable_value.is_basic_std AS basic_std,
  key.order AS key,
  sm_variable_value.label AS label,
  sm_variable_value.variable_type AS type,
  sm_variable_value.length AS length,
  sm_variable_value.display_format AS displayformat,
  sm_variable_value.xml_datatype AS xmldatatype,
  sm_variable_value.xml_codelist AS xmlcodelist,
  sm_variable_value.core AS core,
  sm_variable_value.origin AS origin,
  sm_variable_value.role AS role,
  sm_variable_value.term AS term,
  sm_variable_value.ig_comment AS ig_comment,
  sm_variable_value.enrich_rule AS enrich_rule,
  rel_smdi.ordinal AS order
ORDER BY toInteger(order)

reports.title: Dataset Classes
reports.query:
MATCH (smv:SponsorModelValue)-[rel_smv:HAS_DATASET_CLASS]->(smdi:SponsorModelDatasetClassInstance)<-[:HAS_INSTANCE]-(dataset:DatasetClass)
WHERE smv.name=$neodash_mm_version_name
RETURN "select" AS select,
dataset.uid AS uid,
smdi.is_basic_std AS basic_std
ORDER BY uid

reports.title: Variable Classes - $neodash_mm_dataset_class
reports.query:
MATCH (smv:SponsorModelValue)-[rel_smv:HAS_DATASET_CLASS]->(smdi:SponsorModelDatasetClassInstance)<-[:HAS_INSTANCE]-(dataset:DatasetClass)
WHERE smv.name=$neodash_mm_version_name AND dataset.uid=$neodash_mm_dataset_class
MATCH (smdi)-[rel_smdi:HAS_VARIABLE_CLASS]->(sm_variable_value:SponsorModelVariableClassInstance)<-[:HAS_INSTANCE]-(variable_root:VariableClass)
WHERE rel_smdi.version_number=$neodash_mm_version_number

RETURN DISTINCT
  variable_root.uid AS uid,
  sm_variable_value.is_basic_std AS basic_std,
  sm_variable_value.label AS label,
  sm_variable_value.variable_type AS type,
  sm_variable_value.length AS length,
  sm_variable_value.display_format AS displayformat,
  sm_variable_value.xml_datatype AS xmldatatype,
  sm_variable_value.xml_codelist AS xmlcodelist,
  sm_variable_value.core AS core,
  sm_variable_value.origin AS origin,
  sm_variable_value.role AS role,
  sm_variable_value.term AS term,
  sm_variable_value.ig_comment AS ig_comment,
  sm_variable_value.incl_cre_domain AS incl_cre_domain,
  rel_smdi.ordinal AS order
ORDER BY toInteger(order)

reports.title: Available guides - $neodash_cdash_ig_uid
reports.query:
MATCH (:DataModelCatalogue)-->(m:DataModelIGRoot)
WHERE m.uid contains "CDASHIG"
RETURN "Select" AS select, m.uid AS guide

reports.title: Version - $neodash_cdash_ig_version
reports.query:
MATCH (n:DataModelIGRoot)-->(m:DataModelIGValue)
WHERE n.uid=$neodash_cdash_ig_uid
OPTIONAL MATCH (m)-[:IMPLEMENTS]->(model)
RETURN DISTINCT "Select" AS select, m.name AS version, model.name AS implements ORDER BY version DESC

reports.title: Datasets - $neodash_cdash_dataset_uid
reports.query:
MATCH (catalogue:DataModelCatalogue)-->(model_root:DataModelIGRoot)-->(model_value:DataModelIGValue {name: $neodash_cdash_ig_version})
-[rel:HAS_DATASET]->(value:DatasetInstance)<--(dataset:Dataset)
OPTIONAL MATCH (value)-[implements:IMPLEMENTS_DATASET_CLASS]->(class_value)<-[:HAS_INSTANCE]-(class_root)
WHERE implements.catalogue = catalogue.name AND implements.version_number = model_value.version_number
WITH dataset.uid AS dataset, class_root.uid AS implements, apoc.text.split(rel.ordinal, "\.") AS split_ordinal ORDER BY toInteger(split_ordinal[0]), toInteger(split_ordinal[1])
RETURN DISTINCT "Select" AS select, dataset, implements

MATCH (model_root:DataModelIGRoot)-->(model_value:DataModelIGValue {name: $neodash_cdash_ig_version})
-[:HAS_DATASET]->(dataset_value:DatasetInstance)<--(:Dataset {uid: $neodash_cdash_dataset_uid})
MATCH (dataset_value)-[rel:HAS_DATASET_VARIABLE]->(variable_value:DatasetVariableInstance)<--(variable_root:DatasetVariable)
WHERE rel.version_number=model_value.version_number
OPTIONAL MATCH (variable_value)-[:REFERENCES_CODELIST]->(codelist:CTCodelistRoot)
OPTIONAL MATCH (codelist)-[:HAS_ATTRIBUTES_ROOT]->(codelistattributeroot:CTCodelistAttributesRoot)-[:LATEST]->(codelistattributevalue:CTCodelistAttributesValue)
OPTIONAL MATCH (variable_value)-[implements:IMPLEMENTS_VARIABLE]->()<-[:HAS_INSTANCE]-(implemented)
WHERE implements.catalogue = model_root.uid AND implements.version_number = model_value.version_number
OPTIONAL MATCH (variable_value)-[has_mapping_target:HAS_MAPPING_TARGET]->()<-[:HAS_INSTANCE]-(mapping_target)
WHERE has_mapping_target.version_number = model_value.version_number
WITH variable_root, variable_value, codelist, codelistattributevalue, implemented, mapping_target, apoc.text.split(rel.ordinal, "\.") AS split_ordinal ORDER BY toInteger(split_ordinal[0]), toInteger(split_ordinal[1])
RETURN DISTINCT variable_root.uid AS variable, variable_value.label AS label, variable_value.description AS description, variable_value.simple_datatype AS dataType, variable_value.core AS core, variable_value.completion_instructions AS `completion instructions`, variable_value.implementation_notes AS `implementation notes`, variable_value.mapping_instructions AS `mapping instructions`, collect(DISTINCT(codelist.uid + ' ' + codelistattributevalue.submission_value)) AS codelist, implemented.uid AS implements, collect(DISTINCT mapping_target.uid) AS `mapping targets`

UNION
MATCH (model_root:DataModelIGRoot)-->(model_value:DataModelIGValue {name: $neodash_cdash_ig_version})
-[:HAS_DATASET]->(dataset_value:DatasetInstance)<--(:Dataset {uid: $neodash_cdash_dataset_uid})
MATCH (scenario_value:DatasetScenarioInstance)<--(scenario_root:DatasetScenario)
WHERE scenario_root.uid=$neodash_cdash_scenario_uid
MATCH (dataset_value)-[:HAS_DATASET_SCENARIO]->(scenario_value:DatasetScenarioInstance)-[rel:HAS_DATASET_VARIABLE]->(variable_value:DatasetVariableInstance)<--(variable_root:DatasetVariable)
WHERE rel.version_number=model_value.version_number
MATCH (variable_value)-[rel_imp:HAS_SCENARIO_IMPLEMENTATION]->(implementation)
WHERE rel_imp.version_number=model_value.version_number
OPTIONAL MATCH (implementation)-[:REFERENCES_CODELIST]->(codelist:CTCodelistRoot)
OPTIONAL MATCH (codelist)-[:HAS_ATTRIBUTES_ROOT]->(codelistattributeroot:CTCodelistAttributesRoot)-[:LATEST]->(codelistattributevalue:CTCodelistAttributesValue)
OPTIONAL MATCH (implementation)-[implements:IMPLEMENTS_VARIABLE]->()<-[:HAS_INSTANCE]-(implemented)
WHERE implements.catalogue = model_root.uid AND implements.version_number = model_value.version_number
OPTIONAL MATCH (variable_value)-[has_mapping_target:HAS_MAPPING_TARGET]->()<-[:HAS_INSTANCE]-(mapping_target)
WHERE has_mapping_target.version_number = model_value.version_number
WITH variable_root, variable_value, implementation, codelist, codelistattributevalue, implemented, mapping_target, apoc.text.split(rel.ordinal, "\.") AS split_ordinal ORDER BY toInteger(split_ordinal[0]), toInteger(split_ordinal[1])
RETURN DISTINCT variable_root.uid AS variable, variable_value.label AS label, implementation.description AS description, variable_value.simple_datatype AS dataType, implementation.core AS core, implementation.completion_instructions AS `completion instructions`, implementation.implementation_notes AS `implementation notes`, implementation.mapping_instructions AS `mapping instructions`, collect(DISTINCT(codelist.uid + ' ' + codelistattributevalue.submission_value)) AS codelist, implemented.uid AS implements, collect(DISTINCT mapping_target.uid) AS `mapping targets`

reports.title: Scenarii - $neodash_cdash_scenario_uid
reports.query:
MATCH (model_root:DataModelIGRoot)-->(model_value:DataModelIGValue {name: $neodash_cdash_ig_version})
-[:HAS_DATASET]->(dataset_value:DatasetInstance)<--(:Dataset {uid: $neodash_cdash_dataset_uid})
MATCH (dataset_value)-[rel:HAS_DATASET_SCENARIO]->(scenario_value:DatasetScenarioInstance)<--(scenario_root:DatasetScenario)
WHERE rel.version_number=model_value.version_number
WITH scenario_root.uid AS scenario, apoc.text.split(rel.ordinal, "\.") AS split_ordinal ORDER BY toInteger(split_ordinal[0]), toInteger(split_ordinal[1])
RETURN DISTINCT "Select" AS select, scenario
